name: newton-webapp-fe
description: No fee cryptocurrency trading for Canadians.

scripts.local: cross-env npm run generate-imported-components && REACT_APP_ENV=local REACT_APP_GIT_SHA=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` parcel app/index.html --no-autoinstall --host local.newton.co
scripts.win-dev: cross-env npm run generate-imported-components && SET REACT_APP_ENV=development& parcel app/index.html --no-autoinstall --host local.newton.co --https
scripts.dev: cross-env npm run generate-imported-components && REACT_APP_ENV=development REACT_APP_GIT_SHA=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` parcel --cert ./ssl/local.newton.co.crt --key ./ssl/device.key app/index.html --no-autoinstall --host local.newton.co --https
scripts.copy-rename-gz: rimraf ./build/gz/* && copyfiles -u 2 './build/web/*.css.gz' ./build/gz && renamer --find css.gz --replace css './build/gz/*' && copyfiles -u 2 './build/web/*.js.gz' ./build/gz/ && renamer --find js.gz --replace js './build/gz/*'
scripts.copy-rename-br: rimraf ./build/br/* && copyfiles -u 2 './build/web/*.css.br' ./build/br && renamer --find css.br --replace css './build/br/*'&& copyfiles -u 2 './build/web/*.js.br' ./build/br/ && renamer --find js.br --replace js './build/br/*'
scripts.create-dev: cross-env BABEL_ENV=client REACT_APP_ENV=development parcel build app/index.html -d build/web --public-url /build/web --no-source-maps
scripts.build-dev: npm run generate-imported-components && npm run remove && npm run create-dev && npm run copy && npm run copy-rename-gz && npm run copy-rename-br
scripts.sync-files-dev: rimraf build/web/*.gz build/web/*.br && aws s3 sync build/web/ s3://newton-webapp-dev/build/web --delete
scripts.sync-br-dev: aws s3 sync build/br/ s3://newton-webapp-dev/build/web --exclude '*' --include '*.js' --include '*.css' --exclude 'client.*.js' --cache-control max-age=31536000 --content-encoding br && aws s3 sync build/br/ s3://newton-webapp-dev/build/web --exclude '*' --include 'client.*.js' --cache-control max-age=1800,stale-while-revalidate=300 --content-encoding br
scripts.deploy-dev: cross-env npm run build-dev && npm run sync-files-dev && npm run sync-br-dev && npm run inject-manifest && aws s3 cp build/web/index.html s3://newton-webapp-dev --cache-control no-cache && aws s3 cp build/web/robots.txt s3://newton-webapp-dev && aws s3 cp build/web/sw.js s3://newton-webapp-dev && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E31G1YCMQ7LPNH --path '/*'
scripts.create-bundle:server: cross-env BABEL_ENV=server parcel build server/index.js -d build/server --public-url /build --target=node --no-source-maps
